description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Power Field

Note: Space Marines Only. Relic Master-Crafted Astartes Power Sword of the Deathwatch. Automatically Destroys non-powerfielded or otherwise immune weapons that it parries or that parry it. Also has a 25% chance to destroy Power Fielded or otherwise Immune weapons that are not Relics or of equivilent significance.
